attributes.action: declare a ban on the use of air rifles in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Air rifles cause unnecessary pain when misused. What is their purpose? I can't think of a good reason for anyone to have one. They are often used to subject wild animals and family pets to quite often a slow and agonising death. So please join this group so we can remove these weapons from British streets, and only allow people to use them in controlled conditions.
